resources.string: Direct path to highest mutual attraction.
Something unexpected went wrong with the Facebook login.
Facebook login failed due to a lack of connection. Restore the connection and try again.
Pick the one you like better
Help the algorithm determine your unique dating preferences.
Illustration that depicts two profiles shown side by side and suggests the user to pick the preferred one.
Get matched for maximum mutual attraction
Tired of hundreds of matches that go nowhere? Based on your ranking, we know exactly who is into you.
Start a small number of high quality conversations
Through mutual ranking, you will have much higher quality prospects. Everyone is limited to contact only the 10 best matches daily. Start a genuine conversation now!
A diagram that shows message bubbles.
Something went wrong cropping the image.
Tap a profile to tell us that you prefer that person. \n \nWe\'ll show you the next profiles to compare.
There are no more pairings available.

Beeline has only recently launched. Your support is critical for starting profiles.

Unfortunately, there are no more users in your area to vote on. Please, stick with us.

We'll notify you if someone new signs up in your area.
You do not have any matches
Rank more profiles to find people who like you back.\n\n Beeline is a brand new app. There may not be any profiles left to rank. Be a hero and stick with us.

Once you message a match, that match becomes locked. The daily algorithm won\'t remove the match.\n \n If you like the person, message them quickly. Not that into it? No worries. Keep ranking more profiles.
Break the silence! Send a message!
A button that sends the current message.
This is the famous fuck off button.

Warning! This action cannot be undone! You will NEVER hear from this person again. 
 
 Please, think long and hard before proceeding. Based on your preferences, we've given you the best match that's interested in you. If you reject this person, you'll get the next person on your list. If you ranked them right, you are going to like them less.
 
 But, if you're absolutely sure this isn't going anywhere, then do the merciful thing. Throw this person back into the wild and tell 'em to fuck off!
A button to report a user

Compare-to-rank revolutionizes online dating. Dating is a two sided problem. You can find out the hard way who likes you through weeding outs tons of “hi” messages that go nowhere. Or you can use Beeline. 
 
We'll show you two profiles, and you pick the one you feel more attracted to. The app will ask you to compare your favorite profile against another winning profile. Choosing the same profiles over others again? They’re definitely your soulmates. (Just kidding. But they are your top picks.) 
 
At the same time, everyone else compares and ranks profiles. Once a day, an algorithm matches people for the highest mutual attraction. Think mutual super likes, not simple swipe-right likes.

Tired of endless unanswered messages? Totally over those awkward “hello's” that go nowhere and ready to match with someone who really likes you back? 
 
With Beeline, you are in control of who matches with you. Why trust an algorithm to pick your soulmate anyway? A computer can match two people with similar interests, but it can't determine the why behind why they do what they do. Just because they both love Daredevil doesn't necessarily mean they’re compatible. 
 
We, on the other hand, constantly size up people and choose who we want to get to know. We spend our lives reading people. With Beeline, you get to keep reading people. You are the algorithm. 
 
Sound too good to be true? 
 
A game-proof mechanism ensures that if your guy chose you, he truly picked you over everyone else. 
 
Here's how: You'll be shown two profiles side by side. We've distilled robust information on each person into an easy-to-read profile. You decide whom you you'd rather date: Artsy boy with a soft spot for vegan ice cream, or sexy geek who enjoys jazz shows? Over consecutive comparisons, you teach the app which guys you find most attractive. Repeatedly picking the same guy over others? He might just be your other pea in a pod. 
 
And get this: Guys go through the same process. They also have to choose one girl over the others, so there can be only a handful of girls who keep winning. (Think no swiping right on every girl.) Only those with the strongest mutual attraction get matched. 
 
At this point, you have both handpicked each other. It’s not just a swiped, casual like. You can send each other meaningful messages assured that there is high mutual interest. 
 
Say goodbye to low-investment matches. Say hello to meaningful conversations and highest mutual attraction.

Q: I find rating people demeaning.
 A: We do, too! Beeline is not about rating people. You choose whom you’d rather meet based on the profiles you see. Do you prefer a snowboarder over a hobby gardener?
 
 Q: What if I like both profiles?
 A: The same profiles will come up in future match-ups. Taking all these match-ups together, the app will realize that you like them both very similarly.
 
 Q: What if I select the wrong profile by mistake?
 A: Don't worry about it. The app will match-up the profiles against other profiles later. The wrong tap will be recognized as an anomaly. Simply keep comparing more profiles.
 
 Q: This seems like a popularity contest.
 A: Beeline only matches you with people who really like you back, which means you are free to be yourself. Enjoy a relaxing night in writing poetry and listening to Coltrane? Love being the life of the party? You may just find a special someone who is into that, too.
 
 Another unique aspect of the app is “local peaks” in the distribution: Within certain subgroups different people win the popularity contest. Say if you are a skateboarding punk, you are likely attracted to people inside of that group. If you love hiking and nature, you are likely attracted to people inside of that group. Beeline helps you find your people.
 
 Q: Why am I not getting matched with the people that I select?
 A: With Beeline, we cut to the chase: you only get matched with people who really like you back.
 
 Q: I don’t have anybody to compare!
 A: Beeline is a brand new app with an innovative and superior approach, but enough users have to give us a chance to get this off the ground. If you don’t have anyone to match, it means you are the first person in your area. Help us out: tell your single friends about Beeline!
 
 Q: How can I close my account?
 A: This is a brand new app, and we are still adding more features. Go to your profile and look in the lower right hand corner for a link to deactivate your account.
I\'d love to hear from you. Send your feedback to thomas@playposse.com.

© 2017 Thomas Fischer

 The logo is a combination of artwork from the thenounproject.com:
 Lion by Polina Flegontovna from the Noun Project
 Middle Finger by Piotrek Chuchla from the Noun Project
 Sad emoji by Weltenraser from the Noun Project
To prevent errors, Beeline will continue when network access is restored.
Before you get to look at profiles, you have to complete your own profile. \n \nPlease ensure that you have a main photo and bio.
You are about to close your account.\n\nI personally read all comments. This is my baby, I try to make it better. Your feedback might help me direct my efforts to where they are most needed.

Your account is closed.

Facebook may still show this app for you. To remove it from Facebook, you have to do so on Facebook.

If you want to come back, simply start this app and sign in again.

I\'m glad to you are giving Beeline another try.\n\nLet me know if I can do anything to make your experience better this time. You can use the send feedback link in the navigation drawer to contact me. I personally read those messages.
Inquiring minds want to know.\n\nTogether with gender and distance, it\'s a key decision factor for romantic partners.
So, you say you are from the future! I don\'t think so.
Old is sexy. But go ahead tell us your true age.
We can\'t match you if we don\'t know where you are.

Having a short, concise profile with the most important information up front is critical.
 
 Users absorb profiles quickly to create a gut reaction and vote.
 
 This profile builder will help you create a profile snapshot like this:
 
 Santa Monica, CA - Wants long-term / engineer / no kids / yogi, adventurer / must like dogs
 
 Remember: Choose your words carefully. Potential matches wil see only a short Twitter-size message. Feel free to add more text for your actual matches. While it won't show up in comparison, it'll be visible once you're matched.
Rearrange the items in desired order.
Please be impatient and drum your fingers!
To find your perfect match, we gotta know where you are. Please, enable the location service.
Your session has expired. Please, log in again.\n\n Note: Your session will automatically expire when you sign into a different device.
This app requires network access to log in with Facebook and to connect you with awesome people!
Please, ensure that you have internet connectivity and the Google play services installed.
An e-mail will open where you can send me feedback.
Please, send me your feedback. I care about hearing from you.

An icon that indicates that a new message has arrived.
A heart shaped icon that indicates that you like that user.

1. Choose between two profiles repeatedly. 
2. Find your repeat top choices. 
3. Sit tight while others make their picks. 
4. Discover your top 10 mutual attraction matches.
1. Review the profiles. \n2. Tap your preferred profile for a date. \n3. Rinse and repeat.
Woohoo! Beeline has new matches for you!
The algorithm just finished running. You\'ve been matched!
You\'ve had some matches in Beeline. Now they are gone.
Don\'t worry! Rank more profiles to find who likes you back.
Check out what a cutie\'s writing you!
Please, log in to check if there is someone new for you!
